text: if we were to focus in on the looking at
things differently than other people
can you describe that like what your
angle is or how you see the world that's
a skew or that's you know a tangential
to maybe the way that your colleagues
were looking at things what's that
different perspective well in some sense
it's a very simple uh you see to explain
why I'm different from most computer
people
is because I think like a mathematician
I approach things mathematically not
computationally can you give a for
instance like maybe in a in a basic case
of in a situation where maybe me as a
programmer would approach something
imperatively or computationally uh step
by step whatever it is and you as a
mathematician maybe we would look at it
differently because I've I can't look at
it your way I want to and so how do you
look at things when you say I think
about it in math to me I'm just like
you're going to add numbers together
like what do you mean exactly uh yeah
it's funny I don't have a ready example
except something that happened fairly
recently with you know a colleague was
asked me how would it define something
he said it was you know it's founded
really hard to write this definition it
was defining some property of
sequences actually infinite sequences it
seemed really easy to me
so I wrote the the definition
and what blew his mind was that it was
like a recursive definition just like he
was trying to do that is you define it
for one and then you know for n equals
one and then for assuming it for any you
know for n equals one to find it for n
equals n plus one
but right the value that you could sign
you know given n the value we assigned
to n plus one
depends on the incomplete rest of the
sequences you know infinitely far past n
plus one that's perfectly obvious to a
mathematician but because
he is you know what I call trapped
inside the box of of computational
thinking that never occurred to him
because you know you can't compute
something by looking infinitely far
ahead to find the next value but he
wasn't trying to compute it he was
trying to write a definition
